```css
// Property: scalingMode
// Component(s): Ti.Media, Ti.Media.VideoPlayer, Ti.UI.ImageView
'.scaling-mode-image-aspect-fit': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.IMAGE_SCALING_ASPECT_FIT }
'.scaling-mode-image-aspect-fill': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.IMAGE_SCALING_ASPECT_FILL }
'.scaling-mode-video-resize': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.VIDEO_SCALING_RESIZE }
'.scaling-mode-video-resize-aspect': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.VIDEO_SCALING_RESIZE_ASPECT }
'.scaling-mode-video-resize-aspect-fill': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.VIDEO_SCALING_RESIZE_ASPECT_FILL }
'.scaling-mode-image-auto': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.IMAGE_SCALING_AUTO }
'.scaling-mode-image-none': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.IMAGE_SCALING_NONE }
'.scaling-mode-image-fill': { scalingMode: Ti.Media.IMAGE_SCALING_FILL }
```
